DOC.criteria: Decision make prescribe Menopur® multidose accord Summary product characteristic The study cycle either 1st control ovarian stimulation cycle ever , 2nd control ovarian stimulation cycle ever , 1st 2nd controlled ovarian stimulation cycle achieve ongoing pregnancy previous control ovarian stimulation cycle ( note : subject include make one failed cycle cycle result ongoing pregnancy ) Known ovarian disease ( e.g . ovarian cyst , polycystic ovarian disease etc . ) Diagnosed `` poor responder '' , define either > 20 day gonadotrophin stimulation previous control ovarian stimulation cycle , previous cancellation control ovarian stimulation cycle due limit follicular response , development le 4 follicle ≥15 mm previous control ovarian stimulation cycle Ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome ( OHSS )
